thread.title: Kangana Ranaut admits she’s looking to get married!
thread.title_full: Kangana Ranaut admits she’s looking to get married!

author: IANS
title: Kangana Ranaut admits she’s looking to get married!
text:
Share Tweet Email Kangana Ranaut. PHOTO: FILE Kangana Ranaut, who has gone through her share of tumultuous relationships, has revealed that she has found someone she loves “deeply,” but dating is not on her mind. The actor wants to take the plunge and get married. 
In a tete-a-tete with film critic Anupama Chopra’s digital platform Film Companion, Kangana spoke candidly about her ideo of marriage and how it has evolved with time, reads a statement. 
I have always operated from the place of my individuality: Kangana Ranaut 
“In your early 20s, you wonder why people get married. In late 20s, maternal instincts kick in and you see things differently. It’s nice to come back to a partner who’s watching your back,” she said. “I wanted to give my best to a relationship without the baggage of legal relationships. I now want to give marriage my best but the other person must also come with the same attitude. I have found someone who I deeply love but I’m not keen on just dating. I want to get married.” 
The Queen star has been linked romantically with celebrities like Aditya Pancholi, Adhyayan Suman and Hrithik Roshan in the past. She was also said to have been dating a British man. 
The mystery around her present love interest is yet to be unravelled. 
Have something to add to the story? Share it in the comments below.
